name: Accidental Toy
description: This is a very tactile knitted ball for babies or anyone else to play with. It is made up of twelve garter stitch squares and uses less than 40g of DK weight yarn.
full_text: This is a very tactile knitted ball for babies or anyone else to play with. It is made up of twelve garter stitch squares and uses less than 40g of DK weight yarn. All my ravelry patterns are free to download but, if you enjoy them, please consider making a donation to the British Liver Trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease. You can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here Happy Knitting!
